service.sql: select unit_code, unit_name, inputdate, imdp.m10013 xmmc, --项目名称 imdp.m10012 byqrsr, --本月确认收入 imdp.m10011 bykpje, --本月开票金额 imdp.m10010 byrzch, --本月入账存货 imdp.m10009 ljqrsr, --累计确认收入 imdp.m10008 ljtxml, --累计体现毛利 imdp.m10007 ljkpje, --累计开票金额 imdp.m10006 zmysye, --账面应收余额 imdp.m10005 ljrzch, --累计入账存货 imdp.m10004 chye, --存货余额 imdp.m10003 zmch, --其中：账面存货 imdp.m10002 xmgschye --其中：已项目公司资产形式形成的存货余额 --imdp.m10000 gsbm--项目所在公司编码 from iufo_measure_data_pky3ljnq imdp left join (select alone_id, code, inputdate, ver from iufo_measure_pubdata) imp on imdp.alone_id = imp.alone_id left join (select unit_id, unit_code, unit_name from iufo_unit_info) iui on imdp.m10000 = iui.unit_code where imp.ver in (0, 510) and imdp.m10000 in ('040203010200', '040203010500', '040203010600') and extract(year from to_date(inputdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')) = ${cal.year} and extract(month from to_date(inputdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')) = ${cal.month}
